SEARCH

Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop

package org.bluezoo.gumdrop
Core framework for the Gumdrop multipurpose Java server.

Gumdrop is an event-driven, non-blocking server framework that provides implementations for multiple protocols including HTTP/1.1, HTTP/2, WebSocket, SMTP, POP3, IMAP, FTP, and DNS. It also includes a Servlet 4.0 container for hosting Java web applications.

Architecture

The core architecture is based on Java NIO with a single-threaded event loop (SelectorLoop) that handles all I/O operations. This design enables high concurrency with minimal thread overhead.

Key Components

  • Bootstrap - Application entry point that initializes the server from configuration
  • SelectorLoop - The central event loop handling all non-blocking I/O operations
  • Server - Base class for TCP servers
  • Connector - Factory for creating protocol-specific connections
  • Connection - Base class for handling individual client connections
  • ComponentRegistry - Dependency injection container for wiring components

Configuration

Servers are configured via XML files (typically gumdroprc) which define components, their properties, and dependencies. The ConfigurationParser reads these files and populates the ComponentRegistry.

Example Configuration


 <gumdrop>
   <http-server id="http" port="8080">
     <property name="handler">
       <file-handler document-root="/var/www"/>
     </property>
   </http-server>
 </gumdrop>

SSL/TLS Support

All TCP servers support SSL/TLS through standard Java keystores. SNI (Server Name Indication) is supported for virtual hosting with different certificates per hostname.

Subpackages

  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http - HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 server
  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp - SMTP mail server
  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3 - POP3 mail server
  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap - IMAP mail server
  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp - FTP file server
  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns - DNS server
  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet - Servlet 4.0 container
  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry - OpenTelemetry integration
  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox - Mail storage backends
  • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime - MIME parsing utilities
Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Class
    Description
    AcceptSelectorLoop
    Selector loop dedicated to accepting new connections.
    Bootstrap
    This class bootstraps the gumdrop server.
    ChannelHandler
    Common interface for objects attached to SelectionKeys in the SelectorLoop.
    ChannelHandler.Type
    Channel handler types for efficient dispatch in the selector loop.
    Client
    Abstract base class for client-side connection factories.
    ClientConnectionPool
    A connection pool for Client instances with SelectorLoop affinity.
    ClientConnectionPool.PoolEntry
    An entry in the connection pool.
    ClientConnectionPool.PoolTarget
    Identifies a connection target (host, port, secure).
    ClientHandler
    Base interface for handling client-side connection lifecycle events.
    ComponentDefinition
    Represents a component definition parsed from configuration.
    ComponentReference
    Represents a reference to another component using # fragment syntax.
    ComponentRegistry
    Simple dependency injection container for Gumdrop components.
    ConfigurationParser
    SAX-based parser for the gumdroprc configuration file.
    ConfigurationParser.InlineContextInfo
    Information for creating a Context inline.
    Connection
    Abstract base class for TCP protocol handlers.
    ConnectionInfo
    Provides information about an established connection.
    Connector
    Abstract base class for connection factories.
    ContainerClassLoader
    Class loader to load the gumdrop server classes and its dependencies.
    DatagramClient
    A client that sends and receives datagrams to/from a specific remote address.
    DatagramConnector
    Abstract base class for datagram (UDP) connection factories.
    DatagramServer
    A server that binds to a UDP port and handles datagrams.
    DefaultConnectionInfo
    Default implementation of ConnectionInfo.
    DependencyClassLoader
    Class loader to load J2EE dependency classes from jars.
    Gumdrop
    Central configuration and lifecycle manager for the Gumdrop server.
    LineBasedConnection
    Abstract base class for line-based TCP protocol handlers.
    ListValue
    Represents a list value in component configuration.
    MapValue
    Represents a map value in component configuration.
    ParseResult
    Result of parsing a configuration file.
    PropertyDefinition
    Represents a property to be injected into a component.
    SelectorLoop
    Worker selector loop for handling I/O events.
    SendCallback
    Callback interface for handling data sent via Connection.send(ByteBuffer).
    Server
    Abstract base class for server connectors that listen on ports.
    TimerHandle
    Handle for a scheduled timer, allowing cancellation.
    TLSInfo
    Provides information about a TLS connection.
